name: 8-Bit Arena VR
description: Alert! Alert! -- Captain, Moonbase Six is being attacked again. Get outside and kill as many as you can before time runs out.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 300 MB available space
